definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
member of the senior ministerial class (old)/scholar (old)/bachelor/honorific/soldier/noncommissioned officer/specialist worker

sentences.english: This is what preacher’s talk of - this light in the darkness.
sentences.chinese: 傳教士會說，這黑暗中的光芒啊。

sentences.english: We young Mormon men enter the Aaronic priesthood when we're twelve.
sentences.chinese: 我們年輕的摩門男子在十二歲時就是次級傳教士了。

sentences.english: These churchmen 's acquaintance with France stopped short at Joan of Arc.
sentences.chinese: 這些傳教士對法國的瞭解僅限於有關聖女貞德的傳說。

sentences.english: The introduction of western medicine into China was closely related to the medical activities of western missionaries in China.
sentences.chinese: 西醫學的傳入與傳教士在華的醫學活動分不開。

sentences.english: In the same year an itinerant black preacher arrived in Los Angeles.
sentences.chinese: 就在同一年，一個黑人巡迴傳教士抵達了洛杉磯。

sentences.english: The preacher sermonized to the teacher's teacup.
sentences.chinese: 傳教士對著老師的茶杯說教。

sentences.english: The missionaries were confronted with a conservative, almost fanatical form of Islam.
sentences.chinese: 傳教士要面對保守甚至狂熱的伊斯蘭信衆。

sentences.english: Elder Hsiung is the richest missionary in the mission.
sentences.chinese: 熊長老是傳道部最有錢的傳教士。

sentences.english: In 1906, missionary Pev and Mrs Harry Parsons brought potato into this area.
sentences.chinese: 1906年，傳教士張道惠夫人將洋芋引入石門坎。
其他書名傳教士漢學硏究。

sentences.english: It was rumored that it was a missionary of Catholicism who bribed people to poison the well water.
sentences.chinese: 有傳言稱是天主教的傳教士出錢賄人往井水裏投毒。

sentences.english: Forget about Kama Sutra, missionary style is all you can expect.
sentences.chinese: 忘掉《愛經》吧，有傳教士式就不錯了。

sentences.english: The office elders proposed to the president to buy a computer.
sentences.chinese: 辦公室的傳教士向會長提議買部電腦。

sentences.english: He would sometimes take me along to a European missionary's house.
sentences.chinese: 有時，他會帶我們到一個歐洲傳教士家裏去。

sentences.english: Missionaries have correlation meeting every week.
sentences.chinese: 傳教士每個星期都有協調會。

sentences.english: He is doubling the part of a teacher and a missioner.
sentences.chinese: 他在一齣戲裏扮演教師和傳教士兩個角色。

definition: Matteo Ricci (1552-1610), Jesuit missionary and translator in Ming China
overseas Chinese/(in a restricted sense) Chinese emigrant who still retains Chinese nationality/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
